title: Learning from the experience of removing snow

content.question: What can one learn from the experience of removing snow?

choices.label: How to pace oneself when shoveling heavy snow
The importance of teamwork in a difficult job
What it is like to live in snowy regions
How to use a snowblower effectively

content.answer: What it is like to live in snowy regions

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Make connections among cultural and interdisciplinary information provided in texts.
